attributes.action: NOT introduce laws banning the public performance of Nuskool Breaks music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to our attention that a law is being considered to prohibit the public performance of Nuskool Breaks music..

This sort of regulation will lead to civil unrest and further damage the economy by discouraging people from relaxing and socialising in public places.

We demand that this law is rejected and the Human Rights of fans and musicians are respected.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
